summary_1: In this section, the speaker discusses the coding habits they would inculcate in 2023. They suggest not being afraid of any framework or language, spending more time in the terminal, and learning Git and GitHub. They demonstrate how to use the terminal to play a video, create a folder, and push a file to GitHub. They also suggest contributing to open source projects.
summary_2: In this section, the speaker talks about how to use Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) to deploy a website, and how to contribute to open source projects. He also recommends creating a reading list of blog posts and getting out of one's comfort zone to learn new technologies. Finally, he encourages viewers to link their GitHub profiles in the comments.
summary_of_summaries: This video discusses coding habits for 2023, such as not being afraid of any framework or language, spending more time in the terminal, learning Git and GitHub, and contributing to open source projects. It also covers how to use CI/CD to deploy a website, creating a reading list of blog posts, and getting out of one's comfort zone to learn new technologies. Finally, viewers are encouraged to link their GitHub profiles in the comments.
